channel.title: shell on Geowarin
channel.description: Recent content in shell on Geowarin

item.title: The missing fish shell tutorial
item.description: I must admit it after years of trying to avoid writing script shells: I’m not a big fan of bash. Sure you can do amazing things when you become a script guru but for someone who spends his life trying to write readable code, it feels a bit unnatural. So it was with great pleasure and a bit of excitation that I began playing with the new kid in the shell block: fish.
